SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.data

Class MockEventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.data.MockEventRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventRepository
public class MockEventRepository extends Object implements EventRepository
A mock version of FirebaseEventRepository for local unit testing. It keeps data in memory and does not use Firebase.
